extendedInfo.description: This is the Ad free version of well known app Draw and Share.Draw and Share Pro is an amazing painting app that allows you to paint by finger directly on the phone's screen. You can not only paint everything you want but also draw quick sketches, insert funny clip-arts, type a text and doodle on photos saved on your SD card. Choose  brush effect, stroke width, color, pictures, text style to create impressive paintings! Express Yourself and share your masterpieces with your friends!

reviews.title: Come on
reviews.comment: I ga e you guys my credit card  number and bought pro. Nothing is different, and every time i open the app it tells me to go pro sends me to ur site to tell me its already downloaded. And i cant import my one pics into the program.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use on Galaxy Note w/S-pen!
reviews.comment: This is the BEST drawing app I have tried on my Note. It is So Much better at connecting interrupted lines than Sketchbook that it is almost scary! Love it
reviews.author: A Google User
